CHAT.comment: they return with degu and INV sets it on the table.
child touches glass.
child touches top of cage.
mom takes child's arm who is trying to walk away.
child points into top of cage.
child points to bottom of cage.
child turns cage on table.
child looks up at ceiling.
child turns in his chair and peers into side of the cage.
child picks up closure on top of cage.
child doesn't answer and lifts lid.
child turns cage around.
child taps on cage.
child lifts lid of cage.
mom puts lid back.
child knocks on top of the cage.
child mumbles something to the degu while touching cage.
INV takes degu cage away.
INV rolls the car into the room.
child wheels car across room and mom moves over to sit on the couch.
child walks over to side of the room and mumbles indecipherable utterances.
mom gets up to go help child adjust the temperature.
air conditioner makes clicking noise like it's shutting off.
child pushes car into opposite wall.
child looks up.
mom gets down on the floor and plays with car while child is off camera at the vent making unintelligible sounds.
child comes over and sits by mom.
child pushes car.
child walks back over to the vent.
mom wheels car around and child comes back over.
mom and child push car around then mom sends the car rolling in the opposite direction.
child goes to retrieve it.
child brings car back and taps it on the ground.
child pushes car into opposite wall and gets up and walks away.
child seems to be trying to look at starfish tank.
child goes and plays with car.
child pushes car into wall.
child wheels car close to mom's legs and mom motions for child to set it between her feet.
mom pretends to put gas in the car.
child pushes car into wall.
child walks over to get car and seems to be trying to look at the starfish tank again.
child pushes car around.
child sets car on mom's knee.
INV takes car.
INV takes cover off starfish cage.
INV leaves the room.
child looks around tank.
mom points to something in the back of the tank.
child mumbles something and climbs on mom's lap.
mom picks child up so he can see from the top.
mom carries child over to side of tank.
mom points into tank.
child looks at something on tank.
mom picks up child so he can see inside the tank.
child gets up and leaves view of camera.
child comes back over to starfish tank.
mom points to something in tank.
child looks into reflective mirror.
child leans on the top of tank.
child gets up and walks away.
a click is heard.
child goes back to fishtank.
child tries to look behind computer box.
child is playing with the chairs at the table.
INV covers starfish tank and leaves the room.
child hurries off to other side of the room.
child comes back over.
child turns air on.
child is touching air vent again.
child walks past mom and towards mirror.
mom gets up and sets up blue chair and walks over to child.
child comes over to mom.
child seems to want the mom to move.
mom makes meerkat kiss child on the cheek repeatedly as child giggles.
mom gets up off couch and sits on the floor.
child tries to lift couch cushions and mom makes meerkat kiss him again.
meerkat kisses child again.
child goes back over to chairs.
child turns chair over on its back.
child must shake head no, but he is off camera.
child methodically arranges chairs.
child does not respond to mom's questioning, but asks question about unrelated topic. He is standing back at the air vent.
mom hands meerkat to child.
child sets up chair and puts meerkat on it.
child sets the upright chair with its back on the floor again.
child is staring at the ceiling.
child slaps himself on the forehead and mom laughs.
INV moves toward computer box.
INV leaves the room.
computer box sounds.
INV leaves the room.
child animatedly pushes computer box as it sounds.
child touches it for a while silently, making only surprised noises.
perhaps this is because it is making fewer sounds that the child says this.
mom touches it and child touches it.
mom touches it and it sounds.
child seems to possibly be bored.
child taps top of computer box and looks around then walks away.
child pushes her hand away.
mom points to middle of computer box.
child tries to pick up computer box.
child goes back to chairs and rearranging.
child then goes back to air vent area.
child touches computer box again.
child goes over to couch and gets on it.
child makes undecipherable statements about the couch.
child comes back over to computer box and looks at it.
child is examining cork board and door stopper behind and above the computer box.
child wanders away.
INV sets robodog on the floor.
robodog makes sounds and child gets down to look at it.
INV leaves the room.
robodog walks forward away from child.
child doesn't respond.
child plays with robodog and mom laughs.
child sets robodog on the couch.
mom touches robodog.
mom sets robodog back on the floor.
child speaks to robodog.
robodog walks away and child hits himself in the head.
child talks to robodog.
child pushes on the robodog then gets up and nods its head.
robodog walks towards computer box and child loses interest and goes back to the air vent.
mom picks up robodog and plays with it.
child looks at chairs again.
child peeks into starfish tank.
mom pushes something on robodog and sets it down on the ground.
child goes back over and plays with it.
child knocks robodog on its side.
child pushes open robodog's mouth.
child says something about the door opening.
robodog begins to move.
INV takes robodog.
